name: pnp-list-formatting-speed-dial
title: Speed Dial
shortDescription: This sample creates a speed dial list for your team members/contacts, that you can list as a tab in your teams channel and/or display on your Team SharePoint site, to get quick access to your contacts through Teams call, chat and email.
longDescription: This sample creates a speed dial list for your team members/contacts, that you can list as a tab in your teams channel and/or display on your Team SharePoint site, to get quick access to your contacts through Teams call, chat and email.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
